name: The Strength of the Sea
description:
You play a monster who no longer support poaching. He attacks enemies of the Marine Fauna and show the true strenght of the sea.



The monster uses the celerity of the wind and the wrath of the swell to his advantage.


Use the natural disasters of the sea to your advantage, destroy enemy ships and save the aquatic world
The end of the game is in preparation.

The Strength of the Sea is a game developped by one student at the IIM, as part of the last GameJam of the school Years.
Axel DELATTRE
